title: New: Anna von Hausswolff – Deathbed
content:
We’re checking in again with Swedish songstress Anna von Hausswollf.

After the release of her lastest album in her homeland a few months back, Hausswollf has now teamed up with Berlin-based label City Slang to bring the record to the rest of Europe. Ceremony is coming out on June 13th, and in celebration of this the label have posted epic album track Deathbed up on soundcloud. It’s pretty huge – cut nine minutes out of your day, and give it a listen below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d1a
